title: Storm-Lashed Walls
story: The tempest outside rages, battering the ancient walls of Bran Castle. Loose stones and chilling drafts make every corridor a peril.
effect: While this card is active, movement through any Stairwell (Catacombs, First-Floor, Second-Floor, Third-Floor) costs an additional 1 step (total 3 steps per staircase step). Additionally, at the end of each hero's turn, if they are in a room with large windows (Ballroom, Dining Room, Great Hall, First Tower Bedroom, Master Bedroom, or Second Tower Bedroom), they must roll a D6. On a roll of 1-2, they are struck by debris or cold drafts and lose 1 Health.
